com.illposed.osc

Class OSCPort

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illposed.osc.OSCPort
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OSCPortIn, OSCPortOut

    public class OSCPort
extends java.lang.Object
    OSCPort is an abstract superclass, to send OSC messages, use OSCPortOut. To listen for OSC messages, use OSCPortIn.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close the socket and free-up resources. It is recommended that clients call this when they are done with the port.
